features.featureTitle: Expand the Organic Farming Techniques page (frontend/src/pages/Techniques.tsx) to include at least 9 additional techniques beyond the existing three (Composting, Pest Control, Crop Rotation). Each technique card must display: an emoji icon, the technique name, a 2â€“3 sentence overview description, a step-by-step process section (3â€“5 numbered steps), a key benefits list (at least 3 bullet points), a recommended tools/inputs section listing 2â€“4 relevant tools or materials, and a pro tip or best practice callout.
